transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello. Haan ji very good morning sir. IndiaMART se Priyanka bol rahi hu. Aapne kal jo concern raise kiya tha usi ke liye connect kiya hai. Aap keh rahe the na Vyapar subscription aapko nahi mila hai. Aapka ye Vyapar ka jo subscription hai wo do se teen working days mein live ho jayega. Matlab Friday, Saturday tak aapka ye live ho jayega.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Sir Vyapar subscription. Hardly zyada hoga to Monday tak. Theek hai madam. Maine aage hamari team ko mail dal diya hai. To unka mujhe revert aaya hai ki wo aapka matlab two to three working days mein aapka Vyapar subscription live ho jayega ya to team aapko contact karegi ya WhatsApp karegi. To please aap mujhe reply karke aur apna subscription live kara ke samajh bhi lijiyega sir jo bhi aapko query ho unse Vyapar se related. Theek hai?
Customer: Theek hai madam, theek hai madam.
Executive: Haan, baki mein yaha se aapka concern close karungi. Aapke paas ek mail aayega usse please positive response dijiyega sir.
Customer: Theek hai madam, theek hai.
Executive: Haan ji sir. Okay sure. Thank you so much sir. Baki aur koi query to nahi hai sir?
Customer: Nahi nahi aur kuch nahi hai.
Executive: Restaurant table and chair ka aap lead utha rahe ho. Aapne isko as an product nahi add kiya apne catalog mein to isko as an product add karna hai ya phir nahi add karna hai? Ye bataiye sir.
Customer: Karna hai madam, karna hai.
Executive: Aur outdoor umbrella ye bhi category hai isme bhi aap lead ka consumption kar rahe ho lekin ispe bhi aapne as an product nahi add kiya hua hai.
Customer: Madam karna hai, karna hai dono ko karna hai.
Executive: Ye dono karne hai? To phir mein aapse baat karte hue sir inko add kar de rahi hu. Baki abhi madam fatfat kar dijiye madam kar dijiye.
Executive: Theek hai mein kar de rahi hu. Baki jo abhi aap services jo chala rahe ho please usko 100% sir use kariye. 100% leads ka consumption kariye jisse ki aap ek acha business generate kar pao.
Customer: Mil raha hai madam.
Executive: Mil raha hai? Theek hai. iPhone ka haan.
Customer: Haan. Baki agar koi problem hoti hai to aap please mere number par reach out kar sakte hai. Otherwise Ritik Gupta aapke account manager hai. Aap unko bhi connect kar sakte ho sir. Theek hai?
Customer: Madam aapka number to mere paas hai hi nahi.
Executive: Aapko mein apna number bata de rahi hu. Aap chahe to note bhi kar sakte hai. Mein bata de rahi hu sir aapko number apna.
Customer: Theek hai sir, bol dijiye.
Executive: Haan ji?
Executive: Please note kar lijiye aap mera number.
Customer: Ji madam, number number bataiye madam.
Executive: 7572
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: 7572
Customer: Ji aage?
Executive: 045396
Customer: 045396. Theek hai madam, dhanyavaad madam.
Executive: Haan Priyanka Rajput naam hai. Aap kabhi bhi kisi bhi time contact kar sakte hai. Koi problem nahi hai. Theek hai sir?
Customer: Theek hai madam, theek hai madam.
Executive: Haan ji. Baki maine aapka product add kar diya outdoor umbrella se aur iska price kya rehta hai sir ye jo outdoor umbrella ka product hai aapka?
Customer: Madam dekhe kaun sa aapne pick diya usi hisab se price rehta hai bas.
Executive: Theek hai theek hai koi issue nahi. Update kar dunga abhi.
Executive: Aap khud update kar doge update. Theek hai aap update kar dijiyega. Baki agar koi query ho to hume connect bhi kar lijiyega aur buyer ke calls aate hai please usko bhi respond kariyega. Aapke paas abhi ek mail aayega please positive response dijiyega.
Customer: Theek hai madam.
Executive: Bas itna hi rehta hai.
Customer: Okay. Theek hai sir. Hmm. Haan ji. Okay.
Customer: Theek hai Priyanka ji. Bas connect karta hu kuch der mein. Theek hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer's Vyapar subscription was not activated.

- Restaurant table and chair not added as product.

- Outdoor umbrella not added as product.



Resolution:

- Executive confirmed subscription activation in 2-3 days.

- Executive added restaurant table and chair.

- Executive added outdoor umbrella.

- Executive shared her contact number.



Next Steps: 

- Customer to update the price of umbrella.

- Customer to respond to the feedback mail.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Positive



@@@Key Topics:

- subscription, product addition, catalog, buyleads
